risks.title: Flood Risk
risks.rationale: Campbelltown has areas prone to flooding, and proximity to water bodies increases this risk.

risks.title: Bushfire Risk
risks.rationale: Campbelltown is not in a designated bushfire-prone area, but general awareness is advisable.
what_to_check: Ensure property maintenance reduces fire hazards.

risks.title: Heritage Listing
risks.rationale: The property is not heritage-listed, reducing restrictions on modifications.
what_to_check: Confirm with local council for any heritage overlays.

risks.title: Zoning Restrictions
risks.rationale: Zoning laws may affect property use and future developments.
what_to_check: Verify current zoning with local council.

risks.title: NBN Connectivity
risks.rationale: NBN technology type affects internet speed and reliability.
what_to_check: Check NBN Co's website for technology type and availability.
